name: SNOWBOUND (WhiteOut Software)
description:
Snowbound is a snake like arcade puzzle game where the main goal is to gather snow and reach the goal in a 2d environment. Guide Bob through obstacles and collect coffee cups for higher score.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move in game and menus

ESC key to enter pause menu

Developers

Jere Alakastari  - Project leader / Audio / Coder

Harri Herranen - Graphics 

Toni Niemelä - Coder

Elias Räihälä - Graphics 

Matias Kouri - Level designer / Marketing
